org.md2k.phonesensor.phone.sensors

Class Battery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.md2k.phonesensor.phone.sensors.PhoneSensorDataSource
      • org.md2k.phonesensor.phone.sensors.Battery

  • public class Battery
extends PhoneSensorDataSource
    This class creates a battery sensor which gathers battery temperature, voltage, and charge percentage data.

    The default sampling rate for this sensor is 1 hertz.
